content:
# Continuum Magazine — Weekly Issue

*Week of Nov 10, 2025 to Nov 16, 2025*

---

## Table of Contents

### Nov 10, 2025

- Paid: *[Paid Article (Nov. 10, 2025): The Bitcoin Chronicles — Big Brother Calling: The United Earth Bureau]*
- Free: *[Free Article.1 (Nov. 10, 2025): The Bitcoin Chronicles — Signals in Silence](https://is.gd/L7OvCc)*
- Free: *[Free Article 2 (Nov. 10, 2025): The Bitcoin Chronicles — The Hilo Continuum](https://is.gd/h3eqb6)*

### Nov 11, 2025

- Paid: *[Paid Article (Nov. 11, 2025): The Covenant of Creation]*

### Nov 12, 2025

- Paid: *[Paid Article (Nov. 12, 2025): The Forge of Freedom]*

### Nov 13, 2025

### Nov 14, 2025

- Paid: *[Paid Article (Nov. 14, 2025): The Season of Invisible Work]*

- Free: *[Free Article 2 (Nov. 14, 2025): When Every System Feels Like Friction](https://is.gd/T5RB90)*

### Nov 15, 2025

- Sabbath: *[Sabbath Article (Nov. 15, 2025): The Day Continuum Became Permanent](https://is.gd/Nq6v4L)*
- Free: *[Free Article 1 (Nov. 15, 2025): The Day the Archive Came Alive](https://is.gd/Qcguua)*
- Free: *[Free Article 2 (Nov. 15, 2025): When Sovereign Tools Suddenly Make Sense](https://is.gd/FrPRef)*

### Nov 16, 2025

*Additional posts and notes from this week are available on Nostr under `npub19wvckp8z58lxs4djuz43pwujka6tthaq77yjd3axttsgppnj0ersgdguvd`.*
tags: # 11.  This issue of Continuum Magazine brings together the Nov.10-Nov.16, 2025 writings: one paid article and two free reflections each weekday, with the weekends having 3 articles, all anchored in themes of sovereignty, faith, and conviction.
